title: Is it possible to get Unchained Alistar in Oce?
body: Is it possible to get Unchained Alistar in Oce because of the page where you do it is in NA and when i press login and cant change region or anything, i try anyway but i dont work?

replies.body:
Hey NeonPig,

Unchained Alistar is unfortunately not available for redemption on OCE. For more information on the "Free Swag", check out the Riot Games Support article: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-#h2q5
